name: Cheesy Tomato Pasta
description: A simple and satisfying vegetarian dish perfect for a quick weeknight meal.
ingredients: 1 box (16 oz) pasta (penne, rotini, or your favorite)
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add crushed tomatoes, oregano, and garlic powder. Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Drain pasta and add it to the tomato sauce. Toss to coat.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves, if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

name: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A flavorful and healthy stir-fry recipe packed with protein and vegetables.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 broccoli floret, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 tablespoon sriracha sauce (or more to taste)
instructions: In a medium bowl, toss chicken with cornstarch and soy sauce. Marinate for 15 minutes.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove chicken from the pan and set aside.
Add bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, and onion to the pan. Stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add garlic and cook for an additional minute.
Pour in chicken broth, sriracha sauce, brown sugar, and sesame oil. Bring to a simmer and cook for 2 minutes, or until thickened slightly.
Return chicken to the pan and toss to coat.
Serve over cooked rice and enjoy!

name: Creamy Tomato Soup
description: A comforting and delicious soup perfect for a cold day.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for an additional minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream, basil, and oregano. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Using an immersion blender or blender, puree the soup until smooth. (Optional)
Garnish with fresh parsley, if desired.
Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Spicy Shrimp Pasta
description: A flavorful and spicy pasta dish perfect for a weekend night in.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce, parsley, basil, and oregano. Stir to coat.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Drain and add to the skillet with the sauce.
Add lemon juice, smoked paprika, and red pepper flakes. Stir to combine.
Top with Parmesan cheese and cilantro. Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Roasted Vegetable Tart
description: A flavorful and healthy vegetable tart perfect for a weekend brunch.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, cherry tomatoes, and herbs. Stir to coat.
Pour in beaten egg and Greek yogurt. Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer mixture to a tart pan and bake at 400 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
Top with Parmesan cheese and cilantro. Serve hot and enjoy!
